name: (GMTK) -change of dice
description:
The Idea of the game is that you switch between dice with the same number as you, trying to get all the dice to the goal, I managed some interesting puzzles

Make Sure to Give Me A Rating!

Credits:

Art & Code by me(didn't use an engine)

Minus font, font is from dafont I will find it tommorow

SFX: random places on the internet + edited by @Vubobinali

Playtesting by Vubobinali and my brothers, huge thanks to him!

Also huge thanks to a group of people I brainstormed ideas with, it was good fun.

Music:

Controlls:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/power-pop/day-dreams/

Levels:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/chiptunes/npc-theme/

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/chiptunes/sunny-afternoon/

Win screen:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Origami_Repetika/into-the-ether/gaily-into-th...

The instructions are at the start of the game.

Q:Skip, R:Restart, Space: Switch Die, WASD/Arrows/HJKL: Move

Tips:

Don't get rid of all your dice - you need them

have fun!!
